overview:
Argento Partners is a Business Accelerator for Startups and Scaling firms helping them either:

  • Reposition their firmâ€™s proposition to gain better recognition, customers or investor funding
  • Expand sales into new markets such as global reference wins
  • Accelerate valuation growth through marketing, sales, channel, distribution partnerships
  • Create relationships with partners, investors, sales prospects, trade acquirers, financiers

First we complete a rigourous commerical and technical viability assessment identifying the 2-3 breakthrough issues that would enable a venture scale and succeed globally. We then work intensively to make these happen. We work with a small portfolio of companies over an extended time preparing them for accelerated growth, funding or exit options. We work as either consultants or promoters, but may take executive roles as needed.

Client Sectors include: IT - Software, Mobile, Payments, Wireless, Communications Internet - Digital Media, Online Publishing, eCommerce, Video, Social Media Energy - Renewable Energy, Clean-tech, Conservation, Smart Metering

Industry Sectors include: Digital Media, eCommerce, Healthcare, Utilities, Telecommunications, Facilities, Oil & Gas, Engineering, Energy
